level.heading: Representation by lawyer.
level.text: A party to an arbitration proceeding may be represented by a lawyer.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-111, see notes following ยง 16-4401.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 16 of the Uniform Arbitration Act (2000). See Vol. 7, Pt. I, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
